content.raw: I found a problem that caused the tab to not animate back (the underlying tab had the right position but the animation had not been prodded to run), so that might be fixed. And I'm not sure about the flickering, but I just added a buffer zone - so that you have to drag ten pixels out for the tab to pop out, and then you would have to go ten pixels back again before it popped back in, rather than it just being neighbouring pixels counting as in or out.
content.html: I found a problem that caused the tab to not animate back (the underlying tab had the right position but the animation had not been prodded to run), so that might be fixed. And I'm not sure about the flickering, but I just added a buffer zone - so that you have to drag ten pixels out for the tab to pop out, and then you would have to go ten pixels back again before it popped back in, rather than it just being neighbouring pixels counting as in or out.
